depositStages.title: Initialize Payment
depositStages.description: Specify the amount you wish to deposit.

inputFields.name: Return URL
inputFields.description: Return URL once transaction is complete. Will be appended with a status

inputFields.name: Merchant URL
inputFields.description: Merchant URL. Will be used for 3D secure fingerprint

inputFields.name: Method notification URL
inputFields.description: Method notification URL. Will be used for 3D secure fingerprint

inputFields.name: Lithium processor account
inputFields.description: Lithium processor account contain details about Nuvei payer account

inputFields.name: CVV
inputFields.description: Enter the last three digits of the CVV code on the back of your card.

inputFields.name: Name on card
inputFields.description: Enter your full name as it appears on the front of your card

inputFields.name: Java enabled
inputFields.description: Boolean that represents the ability of the cardholder browser to execute Java.

inputFields.name: Java script enabled
inputFields.description: Boolean that represents the ability of the cardholder browser to execute Java.

inputFields.name: Color depth
inputFields.description: Value representing the bit depth of the color palette for displaying images, in bits per pixel.

inputFields.name: Screen height
inputFields.description: Total height of the cardholder’s screen in pixels.

inputFields.name: Screen width
inputFields.description: Total width of the cardholder’s screen in pixels.

inputFields.name: Time zone
inputFields.description: Time difference between UTC time and the cardholder browser local time, in minutes.

inputFields.name: HTTP accept headers as sent to the 3DS Requestor
inputFields.description: Exact content of the HTTP accept headers as sent to the 3DS Requestor from the cardholder’s browser.

inputFields.name: Method completion indication
inputFields.description: Indicates whether the 3D-Secure v2 fingerprint challenge was successfully completed.

withdrawalStages.title: Enter Amount
withdrawalStages.description: Specify the amount you wish to withdraw.

inputFields.name: Lithium processor account
inputFields.description: Lithium processor account contain details about Nuvei payer account
